NARRATOR? (SYNC) Like the light-pen on
the Computer Sketchpad.. .television is
tracing new dimensions for a quickly-
altering world It doesn’t need to tel I
us WHAT OUR PROBLEMS ARE.. .but we're
mighty glad to have its help in SOLVING
some of them.
NARRATOR: (OFF SCREEN) And it IS a
help to have television moving messages from
that world.. .up in easy reach.. .three inches
from learning.
CLOSING TITLES AND CREDITS.
